name: Anno 1404
notes: Executable is set to "Anno1404.exe" (base game) by default. Set it to "Addon.exe" to play the Anno 1404: Venice expansion.

input_menu.description: Select how much VRAM (GPU memory) you want to allocate:

merge.description: Copying user config for base game...

content:
game:
  appid: 33350
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- input_menu:
    description: 'Select your display refresh rate:'
    id: REFRESHRATE
    options:
    - '60': 60 hz
    - '75': 75 hz
    - '120': 120 hz
    - '144': 144 hz
    preselect: '60'
- input_menu:
    description: 'Select how much VRAM (GPU memory) you want to allocate:'
    id: MEM
    options:
    - '256': 256MB
    - '512': 512MB
    - '1024': 1024MB
    - '2048': 2048MB
    - '4096': 4096MB
    preselect: '1024'
- task:
    app: corefonts d3dx9
    description: winetricks for Steam (corefonts) and d3d9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- write_file:
    content: '<InitFile>

      <RefreshRate>$INPUT_REFRESHRATE</RefreshRate>

      <DirectXVersion>9</DirectXVersion>

      </InitFile>

      '
    file: /tmp/Engine.ini
- merge:
    description: Copying user config for base game...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/users/$USER/Application Data/Ubisoft/Anno1404/Config/
    src: /tmp/Engine.ini
- merge:
    description: Copying user config for addon...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/users/$USER/Application Data/Ubisoft/Anno1404Addon/Config/
    src: /tmp/Engine.ini
system:
  env:
    PBA_ENABLE: '1'
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: '1'
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATION: '1'
    __PBA_GEO_HEAP: $INPUT_MEM
    run_without_steam: true
winesteam:
  esync: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native
